revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - See previous comments and add: passim: change corr to reg passim: delete superfluous spaces. l5: => <:Τερτονπεκοοῦ|reg|Τερτοπεκωοῦ:> l7: => <:<#ζ=7#>|subst|<#ια=11#>(?):> l9: => <:<#β=2#>|subst|<#η=8#> (?):> l16: => (ἐποί(κιον)) l18: add supraline above the first ν of Τερτωνκάνω; => <:<:<#β=2#>|subst|<#α=1#> (?):>|alt|<:<#α=1#>|subst|<#β=2#> (?):>:> l19: follow Sosin's suggestion.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;16;12377' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;26;16737'

Resubmitting a broken file. The text was entered by Nikolaos Gonis. Have copied over the original submit notes and one vote by Joshua Sosin:
Joshua D. Sosin 2011-02-23 22:14:58 UTC vote on Text AcceptText - Accept. Passim all *check* --> *x*; lin5--> Τερτονπεκοοῦ|orth|Τερτονπεκωοῦ; lin7--> <#ζ=7#>|subst|<#ια=11#>; Lin9--> <#β=2#>|subst|<#η=8#>; lin19 I'd have thought the following was sufficient and accurate: <:.1|alt:|<#θ̣=9#>:> Nikolaos Gonis 2011-02-12 21:03:35 UTC submit on Text Emended SB 16 12377 after SB 26 16737.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; changed sic to surplus; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
